trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> class represents the `providers` element within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> classe rappresenta il `providers` elemento all'interno di un file di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to iterate through the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection.Providers%2A> property, which returns a <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come scorrere il <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationSection.Providers%2A> proprietà, che restituisce un <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings" /> object to the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Add%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Add%2A> metodo per aggiungere un <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> oggetto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Clear%2A> metodo per rimuovere tutti <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> oggetti dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Accesses an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection" /> class.
Use this method to access a specified <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object contained within this <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per accedere a un oggetto specificato <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> contenuto all'interno di questo oggetto <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: A string reference to the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings" /> object within the collection.
Gets an item from the collection.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings" /> object contained in the collection.
Gets or sets a value at the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore nell'insieme <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Item%2A> property to get or set a specified <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object contained within this <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Item%2A> proprietà da ottenere o impostare un oggetto specificato <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> contenuto all'interno di questo oggetto <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: Removes an element from the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a specified <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection.Remove%2A> metodo per rimuovere un oggetto specificato <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> oggetto dalla raccolta.
